price: Na hakika Mola wako Mlezi ndiye atakaye wakusanya. Hakika Yeye ni Mwenye hikima na Mjuzi.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٞ
footnotes: Na hakika walio tangulia na walio taakhari watakusanywa wakati mmoja. Na Mwenyezi Mungu atawahisabia na atawalipa. Na hayo ni kwa mujibu wa hikima yake na ujuzi wake. Na Yeye ndiye anaye itwa Mwenye hikima, Mwenye ujuzi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka huwa yaḥshuruhum innahu ḥakīmun ʿalīmun
